name: Excess coverage permitted
text: §287-30  Excess coverage permitted.  Any policy which grants the coverage required for a motor vehicle liability policy may also grant any lawful coverage in excess of or in addition to the coverage specified for a motor vehicle liability policy and the excess or additional coverage shall not be subject to this chapter.  With respect to a policy which grants such excess or additional coverage the term "motor vehicle liability policy" shall apply only to that part of the coverage which is required by this chapter. [L 1949, c 393, pt of §1; RL 1955, §160-108; HRS §287-30]
